    About Me

    I am Kyung-Min Jin, a master’s student in the graduate school of Artificial Intelligence at Korea University (PRML Lab), where I am advised by Prof Seong-Hwan Lee. Before studying at graduate school, I received Bachelor’s degrees (Computer Science and Engineering) and (Artificial Intelligence) at Korea University in 2021.
